alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 5:02PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GADSDEN AND LEON COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EST... At 502 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Havana to 6 miles northwest of Woodville. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Florida A and M, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, Miccosukee, South City, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Tallahassee Regional A/P, Governors Square Mall, Natural Bridge, Midtown, and Apalachee Ridge Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EST for Big Bend Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
